comments: This JSON file holds the summary information from which the app builds the various services and manifests.
It's not a manifest, image service or auth service! - look at what the app generates for reference.
This is just the app-specific plumbing to make the app work, not a recipe or reference implementation.

files.label: Standard login

metadata.label: Note
metadata.value: This interaction pattern assumes the user can interact with something in the opened window
